name: MediaFuel
tagline: Helping companies solve their business problems
description:
MediaFuel, located near Indianapolis, Indiana, is a cutting-edge marketing firm specializing in web and interactive. We help businesses with the marketing and branding of their products and services using tools such as graphic design, website development, audio/video production and digital photography. Projects can range from a simple brochure to a full out interactive video website with virtual tours and built-in video.
Specialties include: marketing, advertising, web design, web development, and audio video production.
